BR_text.BRsummary: SFrame.show crashes if there are 0 effective columns
BR_text.BRdescription:
Repro steps:
 <denchmark-code>In [1]: import turicreate as tc
 In [2]: sf = tc.SFrame([[1,2,3]])
 In [3]: sf.show()
 Materializing SFrame
 Warning: Skipping column 'X1'. Unable to show columns of type 'array'; only [int, float, str] can be shown.
 Further warnings of unsupported type will be suppressed.
 </denchmark-code>
 
 Expected: works
 Actual:
 <denchmark-code>[1]    68125 floating point exception  ipython
 </denchmark-code>
 
 It attempts to compute batch size with 5000000 / num_columns, but this will crash if num_columns is 0.
